long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the Good People Click browser extension to get notified when a percentage of your online purchases can go to charity at no cost to you! ü´∂

It only takes 2 seconds to make a positive impact:

1. Click ‚ÄúActivate Good People Click‚Äù
2. Select the store to activate the tracking
3. Continue shopping as normal

After you complete your purchase, the store pays us for referring you and we use that money to make donations to high-impact charities.

This means you can now make a positive impact with just 1 extra click! Simple as that.

Legend

‚ù§Ô∏è = We support this store and Good People Click is activated.

üñ§ = We support this store, but you need to re-activate the tracking.
